msItem.title: Tarikh-i 'Alamara-yi 'Abbasi.
msItem.note: Donations Register for May 19 1827. Part 2: 'Unwan-i sahifah-i saltanat wa 'alamara'i Incomplete at end. Front flyleaf, recto: Presented by Sir John Malcolm May 19. 1827. Folio one, recto, note of ownership by Muhammad a'Askari, dated 1180. A history of the Safavid dynasty of Persia from its origin to the death of Shah 'Abbas I, AH 1037. Vol. I and first part of Vol. II Headings and punctuation in red. Headings left empty in the latter part of the MS.
msItem.incipit: Incipit of part 1: Chun nashr-i mahamid-i kibriya-yi Ilahi

bindingDesc.p: Dark red Oriental binding with stamped decoration. Back cover detached.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org

list.item: History of Persia, Safavid period, Shah 'Abbas.
